messages.text: Hello, this is Sarah from City Pharma. I'm calling to check the availability of Paracetamol 500mg tablets, specifically a box of 20 tablets. Do you have this product in stock?
Hello Sarah. Yes, we do have Paracetamol 500mg in stock. We have several boxes available. How many would you need?
That's great to hear. We're looking to order 50 boxes. Can you confirm the current stock level and when you could deliver?
Absolutely. We currently have about 200 boxes in our warehouse. We can deliver within 2 to 3 business days. Would that work for you?
Perfect, that timeline works well for us. Can you also confirm the unit price per box?
Yes, the price is 8.50 euros per box for orders of 50 boxes or more. We also offer a 5% discount for orders over 100 boxes.
Excellent. I'll note that information. Thank you so much for your help today. Have a great day!
You're welcome, Sarah. Feel free to call us anytime if you need anything else. Goodbye!
